attributes.action: Toughen up on those who take parent/child parking spaces at supermarkets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At every Supermarket there are spaces provided for parents with children. These spaces are there so we can get our pushchairs out safely and our children in them safely and also so we can get our children in and out of their carseats safely. We cannot do this if  we are not in the space. We put our children at risk because ignorant people keep taking our spaces!! 
There should be tougher fines and employed people to do this job. This way the problem will lessen if not stop!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
